Title: Prohibits the short term rental of private dwellings
Summary: Establishes regulations for the short term rental of private dwellings; defines  terms; requires registration and safety precautions.
LawCode: Add Art 2-A §§20 - 24-a, Mult Res L; amd §§1101, 1105, 1131 & 1132, add Art 29 part 1 Subpart A §1200, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple residence law and the tax law, in relation to short-term residential rental of private dwellings in certain municipalities
